content: I'm glad you're open to exploring new physical activities to help with your anxiety. Since you mentioned enjoying your Saturday dance class, I thought I'd suggest a few other exercises that might interest you. Have you considered trying yoga, walking, or swimming? These activities can help reduce anxiety and improve overall well-being. Additionally, you might enjoy tai chi, Pilates, or dance-based workouts like Zumba or Hip Hop Abs. Remember to consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new exercise program.
